title: The Taming
description: Iliana has fallen in love with Nickolas, but his dominant personality and her independent streak often clashed every time they went their natural tendencies. He wanted to buy her expensive things, for example, but she would feel cheap. When he left her for a business trip and she was alone at last to think without his overpowering presence, she realized she didn't know significant things about him, while what she knew are things that only instinct could tell. Those scars on his body made his past not as happy and serene. And the one time he lost control proved that he could be very dangerous.Should she run? Like hell! Even when instinct screamed at her to do so, her body always betrayed her. Bastard he could be but he wouldn't let her go. And she wasn't sure she wanted him to.The panther and the stray cat were at a standoff. Except Nickolas didn't know it... yet.Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex, extended orgasms, and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
